metadata.title: CVE-2012-4419 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
The compare_tor_addr_to_addr_policy function in or/policies.c in Tor before0.2.2.39, and 0.2.3.x before 0.2.3.21-rc, allows remote attackers to causea denial of service (assertion failure and daemon exit) via a zero-valuedport field that is not properly handled during policy comparison.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-4419` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tor - 0.2.3.22-rc-1
tor-geoipdb - 0.2.3.22-rc-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: tor package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.2.3.22-rc-1').
